name: Super bug run reeses cups snail adventure with bug man
name_original: Super bug run reeses cups snail adventure with bug man
description: This is my first game jam (Game off 2021)  so don't be surprized if the game is bad. Thanks to https://ambientcg.com for the free high quality textures! Anyways, as i said the game is not that good. In the game there are 8 levels in wich you have to find a randoly placed object (Reeses Cup) but the game isn't that easy. There is a snail chasing after you! You might ask what does this have to do with the theme ''bug''? Well the player is in fact a bug. Yea. Anyway this game has no story BUT at the end will  be a cutscene with a HUGE plot twst. Play though it to see!
